website_summaries.verdict: With its swappable headband and glasses options, multiple lenses, and adjustable LED light, this headband magnifier truly is a one-size-fits-all solution for common magnification problems.
cons: Rests on the bridge of your nose

customer_reviews.title: Magnifier makes work easier and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! I paint miniatures and this magnifier makes my hobby so much more pleasurable. The headband sits comfortably on my small head and having the light is an extra bonus. I haven't used all the magnifications yet, but glad to know I have them if I need them. I wear glasses and if I wanted to could wear the headband magnifier with my prescription if I wanted, however haven't needed to. These make painting easier then using one of the big round magnifying lights. I don't second guess where my brush is landing and can really get the details right!!! This has also stopped my eyes from getting tired after several hours of work.
customer_reviews.author: V Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Finally found something that works
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for close work projects! I showed it too a friend that is suffering from Macular Degeneration and she teared up when she put them on and could read things that she couldn't even with her RX glasses. Not saying that this is a treatment for her disease. But seeing her face light up when putting them on, I am buying another pair for her. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because they are a little heavy on the bridge of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: pclark

customer_reviews.title: Super great buy! Amazing value! Quality product! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: How perfect! These are great quality! There's not much more that I can say that the other "reviewers" haven't already stated, but.. I am so happy about buying these glasses! I'd love to order them again, IF I ever even need another pair! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Devin R.

customer_reviews.title: ... item 3 months ago and it has been a wonderful product. I am now having an issue with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 3 months ago and it has been a wonderful product. I am now having an issue with the on/off switch for the light. I have contacted the seller and am waiting on a reply on how to fix the problem. I presume they will contact me with repair instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Don Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Easy to use.  Can't live without them in my creative pursuits
customer_reviews.text: If you do anything with photography, painting, needle work, or anything else that requires you to have a close up view (think magnifying glass) these glasses are PERFECT. Put them on just like glasses, but there's a light and several change out lenses to adjust the close up of the lens. When my eyes get tired; I can flip up the lens and do whatever it is I want to do and flip them back down when I'm ready to work again.
customer_reviews.author: MsKindleReader

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I do lots of crafts with vinyl, making jewelry, etc and wear reading glasses. I've been looking for some way to magnify so I can see what I'm doing better. These are perfect! It comes with several different lens magnifying strengths as well as a strap if you want to use that. Otherwise you can just put them on like a pair of glasses and they'll actually fit over your glasses as you can see in my photos. It does take three AAA batteries for for the little light and those are not included of course. Seems to be a good quality product and exactly what I was looking for. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Nitzband

customer_reviews.title: Winner! Loved and I will buy more soon!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered it I was suspicious it might not work as describe; happy to say that I was wrong! The product is easy to use, and works as describe! It is has been very helpful to me while I try to fix tiny gadgets. I am inspire to take some sawing class now! :) One word of caution, it is make of plastic; so, handle it gently! I will certainly will buy more of this product to gift some of my aunts! They gonna love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. or R. P

customer_reviews.title: the wearing is very comfortable, and the lenses are clear and clean
customer_reviews.text: the wearing with the headband is very comfortable, and the lenses are clear and clean. Big help with the led lights! good product. However, I like wearing with the headband better than with the legs. With the legs, the glasses would be very easy to fall off. A little surprised the package doesn't come with the AAA battery, so it is not "an open the box and ready to use product". This won't be a disadvantage for the product, but would be ignoring if there are no 3 spared AAA battery at home.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Bad nose piece for an otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. The light is bright and easy to direct. The lens come in a nice protective case. My only complaint is the nose piece. It is a piece of metal screwed into the frame. When I use the item the screws dig into my skin and I haven't yet found a comfortable adjustment for my nose. I plan to figure out some kind of padding to go over the screws. I also cannot wear it over my glasses but it works well for me without them. Other than these problems I really like the light and the magnification when doing cross stitch.
customer_reviews.author: Telitha Roby

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and light weight. I design jewelry and the 2 LED's are perfect to see tiny items. The lenses can be easily changed by simply pushing it into the holder and pulling it out when done. The lens tilts up or down so I'm able to work on something that is on my table or that I'm holding in my hand. Perfect! The kit includes: 1 pair of glasses, 5 lenses (ranging from 1x to 3.5x) including a container for them (the magnification is on the bottom of the container), one strap, a cleaning cloth and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great one. The quality is good when compares to ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are an amateur looking for something bright magnifier, this is a great one. The quality is good when compares to what you pay for. I use it in a medical setting as a backup to my expensive one and still find this useful.
customer_reviews.author: Icela

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for hands-free magnification without having to bend over a standing magnifying glass. I use it for a lot of things like doing my manicure, getting a splinter out of my finger, threading needles, hand sewing, reading fine print, checking stone settings in my rings, repairing jewelry, just so many things! I just wish I could get my toes closer to my face so I could do my pedicure but I’m too old and not that bendy any more! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Teddi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Break easy
customer_reviews.text: Literally the arm of the glasses broke the first time i put them on. Definitely invest in ones a little more expensive they feel very cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Batch

customer_reviews.title: Great Headband Magnifier with Headlight
customer_reviews.text: These Headband Magnifiers work very well, and there is a selection of five interchangeable lenses from a 1 to 3, I believe, which is plenty of magnification. I have started wearing "readers" and the 1 lense works well for my needs at my desk. These are too heavy to wear all day since the AAA batteries for the double LED headlights are mounted above the nose piece. Comfortable temple pieces. Well made with easily interchangeable lenses.
customer_reviews.author: beebop

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it for most homes
customer_reviews.text: Very handy device. I got it for one project in mind, but now it is a go to tool that I have used on multiple occasions. Versatile, with various lens strengths included. At such an economical price, I'd recommend it for most homes.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Koenig

customer_reviews.title: This is great for short-term use
customer_reviews.text: The light is in the right place to see fine details on circuit boards and such, I like that a lot. Nice assortment of lens given. I have opened and closed the lens case many times, it seems sturdy to me. Only issue I have is that the weight from the batteries will bother your nose after a while. So really, using for an hour is no big deal, but if you had to go longer, it will start bugging you.
customer_reviews.author: Dan27

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this for cross stitching and doing bead work! I like that I can use different lenses and adjust the lens and light angles. Does not give me a headache or bother my sinuses like other magnifiers. I love it! I'm so glad that someone in a FB group recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Lyda

customer_reviews.title: Was uncomfortable, had to send back
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with a different magnified b/c this one was really uncomfortable on. It may just be how it sat on my head in particular, but I found the OptiSight way more comfy. This one somehow felt like it was pinching me.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my permanent makeup practice to get clearer views of some of the areas I'm working on. The light is not overly strong, which is ideal. I just need a solid view of a small area. The head piece is really low profile for its function. It is not very heavy at all and is easy to take off and put back on as it is a more of a visor. I LOVE that it came with a box of different magnifiers. I will update my review after more use!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. Only issue I have is the front where the battery compartment is gets a bit heavy on the bridge of the nose after a while. Can wear as glasses or it comes with anelastic band you can use instead. Light is adjustable. Lenses come in a handy storage box. Overall a good product just a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: LonJay

customer_reviews.title: Good for doing close up work
customer_reviews.text: I make models and do a lot of close-up and small projects requiring good magnification and light. These work well for my needs. It gives multiple lenses in varying degrees of magnification. The lenses are easily removed or changed. The part the the lenses are clipped is made of and swap out easily. It works great, fit well and offer a clear image.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought these because I couldn’t see my dogs nails to trim them. White dog (Maltese) with white nails. I use the stretchy strap instead of the arms. Much more secure and very comfortable. I am so glad I made this purchase. One of the few things that I’ve been this happy about from Amazon in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very handy. I have used them a few times and found the light very brite and the different magnification lense easy to install. The headset is comfortable and not a distraction for me. Very happy !
customer_reviews.author: trailshots

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my crafts projects and very little sewing. I tried it out when I first received it, but today it saved me a lot of cursing as I tried to thread my sewing machine. With the help of the magnify glass, I was able to thread it the first time. As I've read in other reviews, it is a bit heavy, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Tanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for up close and personal. I guess I didn't read it well enough, wasn't aware of the extra lenses that came with! MOMS - great for checking kids' hair when lice breakouts are happening! You can see the dust from the playground.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are amazing! My eyesight is terrible but with these glasses, I can do any kind of closeup work without problems. There are many different lenses with different strengths. The lenses are easy to change. You also have the option of having a headband to hold the glasses on instead of the standard arms. The light on the glasses really helps as well. The only down side is that they get a little bit heavy after you been wearing them a while but that downside is totally worth it for me! I would highly recommend buying these if you need to see better doing closeup work of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Only for small heads!
customer_reviews.text: The magnifiers and led lights are terrific; however, the item is not made for anyone with an average to large head. It is much too narrow! I will keep the item but will have to make major modifications to make it fit my head. Hopefully my modifications will make it useable.
customer_reviews.author: Archi

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough & A little heavy as glasses
customer_reviews.text: It says you can wear it two ways but did not come with the head strap. They’re decent but I do start to get a headache from the weight. Came with a few different magnifying lenses but Would like to be able to slide the magnifying portion back/forward. I purchased these to use for lash extensions but cannot wear them throughout the entire installation
customer_reviews.author: ArCh Skincare

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Love the different magnifying lens...Fits comfortably, Works very well..Bought this because I could use it like a pair of glasses...easy on easy off. Unfortunately the arm below the hinge just wont' last very long..The little strengthening ribs aren't located to prevent bending from placing on the face..
customer_reviews.author: Red1

customer_reviews.title: Great lenses at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of using a hand held magnifying glass and ordered this Headband set, couldn't be more pleased. Clipped on the lowest magnification lense and put on glasses and could see perfectly. The set of lenses appear to be very good quality and are well protected in their plastic case. This set should last years. Very good price too!!
customer_reviews.author: C Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good product, well made, but...
customer_reviews.text: High quality, well made, works very well, and comfortable. Lenses seem quite good. The lenses stand off your face a bit, so the depth and field of focus are limited. And, if you're used to wearing regular readers, when you flip these lenses up, you miss your readers. Great for dedicated close-up work.
customer_reviews.author: hardrock_555

customer_reviews.title: Gets heavy once the batteries are in.
customer_reviews.text: The magnify Glass is good. I like that it comes with different Lens to work for different eye sights. the only downfall is... Once you put the batteries in to use the light it gets heavy And slides off your nose. Also makes Nose Sore.
customer_reviews.author: sherry smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for facial services
customer_reviews.text: I am an esthetician who travels to clients homes doing lash lifts, microdermabrasion, facials and micro-needling services. This is a perfect substitute for my mag lamp. The price is great. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. I like all the attachments that come with it. The light illuminates the task one is working on very well. CON: If you don't use the adjustable headband with the glasses then the glasses will eventually slide to the tip of your nose from the weight of the lens and the protruding attachment and it will hurt your nose. Well, not hurt but it will get sore.
customer_reviews.author: EVDuharte

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Dad because he is getting up there and his eyes don't work as well. He loves them. I have bought three pairs so far. One for me, Dad and an Aunt. The batteries can make the piece a little heavy but if you have another light source you won't need the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: I need to return them I was so hopefull they would work for my mom,unfortunately they didn’t. Nice glasses Just not for wet macular degeneration
customer_reviews.author: marsha johnson

customer_reviews.title: chock full of magnifying lenses
customer_reviews.text: i haven't gotten a lot of use from these, but i'm impressed with what's in the box. and am looking forward of making good use of all of these lenses. the glass frame does the job. and the lamp will come in handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: mdrhea

customer_reviews.title: More vision with added light and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Make miniatures (dollhouses). Took to miniature club and several members liked so much they ordered it also. It is lightweight and the lamp is very bright. The additional magnification lenses is added value.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia in FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am legally blind and love to make jewelry and crochet. This is a wonderful handsfree product with the light and magnifying glass so I don't need glasses or lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he likes it very much, specially because is light. Thanks to the seller for sending this package in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cherstine-Turcios

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for sewing...picking out threads. They are lightweight, very clear. Very useful. Good value. The LED bulb is not very strong but I use other lighting and just removed the batteries to make them lighter on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnification glasses
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several and decided on these. They worked great for me. Liked being able to change out to different lenses. Not a bad deal at all!
customer_reviews.author: Chat610

customer_reviews.title: Painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: Heavy on nose...rips hair out from the arms having rubber grips.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chica

customer_reviews.title: magnifier lenses
customer_reviews.text: the system is too complicated to be able to focus in your area of work. i rather continue with the regular magnifiers
customer_reviews.author: Sofrofl

customer_reviews.title: Product will help me greatly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to see close up for sewing. I spent 20 minutes threading a needle last week because I could not see. With this on, I got it in 2 seconds! Money well spent. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: abw

customer_reviews.title: Nexus Rockland country dentist could I've been bigger
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they fit but they could have made the lenses bigger, and they definitely should have made the lenses to snap in and hold tighter mine keep falling out every time I lift the lens up. They do work I meant on your face well
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works really great ... Comes with a bunch of different sized magnification lenses which are easily changed out... All you need is 3-AAA batteries and you're good to go to turn on the light. Fits any size head ... I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these magnifier glasses! Fits nice, bright light so I can see to needle felt, crochet, etc. while watching TV - can see over the magnifiers to see the TV, which is nice. My husband like it so much I have to get one for him!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Koltenuk

customer_reviews.title: Super. Buy it
customer_reviews.text: What a super product. Great to work on small things. I have bought 2 now. The 1st I gave away as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I struggle to see fine things up close, these are awesome. You can choose the magnification you need.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne baby boomer

customer_reviews.title: easy to wear and use
customer_reviews.text: love the chose ok lenses easy to use and wear you have choice of a head band or eye glass arms or temples
customer_reviews.author: Francis G. Peteya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I do a lot of crafting and sometimes it's just to hard to see. Especially when I'm water coloring. This does a excellent job. The light helps a lit also but the glasses have interchangeable lens. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Keya M Conley

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these and they are so lightweight that they don't leave marks on your forehead. And they don't give you a headache. And they have many different magnifying lenses to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: k.lopez

customer_reviews.title: You can wear them over your regular glasses and really magnafine the item you are needing it for.
customer_reviews.text: They work great on what you're needing them for. You need the strap around the head for comfort. They are a bit heavy on the head for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Eskew

customer_reviews.title: I can see tiny details like never before.
customer_reviews.text: If I had known how useful these things are I would have purchased some many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and detailed instructions. I love the fact that different lenses can be inserted. It fits snugly so I'm not worried about it falling off. I have not tried the strap. It is a bit small for my big head but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Inventor2Go

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I use them for cross stitch.I wear glasses and for me taking off the nose piece made a world of difference .They do get heavy with the nose piece on, it is less noticeable with it off.
customer_reviews.author: anne s

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to see better when working on my diamond painting. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Craft Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Their just what I needed for beading and jewelry repair. The nose bridge can stand to have a little cushioning though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai1731

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The lights and lenses are a little smaller than expected and working over my glasses is a little challenging to get the field of view expected.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Every needlepointer should have these in their bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for needlepoint indoors or in low light. Very helpful for darker threads that can often cause skipped stitches. Magnifying feature is helpful for aging eyes that don’t see quite as well any more. Allows me to continue with needlework for longer periods of time and with fewer tension headaches
customer_reviews.author: ashley lundergan

customer_reviews.title: No usefull for me
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bid small. I do not can see when I have it on the head.
customer_reviews.author: JOWA

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for almost a year. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: G Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Handy and useful little tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Planning on taking it with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Won't go over glasses
customer_reviews.text: Will not go over glasses. Strap is hard to use
customer_reviews.author: UFO baby

customer_reviews.title: the recommend
customer_reviews.text: me have helped much with my work for see the things tiny and not weigh
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Lara

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable magnifier I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: The3 AAA batteries in the housing put painful pressure on the nose piece. Removing the batteries and changing to the elastic retainer doesn't solve the problem. Bending and padding the nose piece doesn't help either.
customer_reviews.author: Admiral T

customer_reviews.title: BEING ABLE TO SEE WHAT IM COLORING
customer_reviews.text: REALLY GREAT FOR ANY VISION...WORKS GREAT FOR COLORING...BUT....THEY ARE A BIT HEAVY ON THE EARS AND NOSE
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHY BARNES

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They only thing I don’t care for is the nose piece, they feel heavy when worn longer 10 min
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, I appreciate tools like these. Love the fact that I can switch out the lens, depending on the strength I need.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this made such a HUGE difference for me! I use this when soldering and inspecting my solder work on drone flight controllers and ESCs. I was very skeptical but after the first use (I did not use the head strap, by the way) I knew I should've bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: sarukun

customer_reviews.title: I can see!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but if handled carefully and responsibly it works well for what it is designed for. The price is right. What, did you expect, precision ground optical lenses with high quality frames......?
customer_reviews.author: Ron L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It is built very well at a very reasonable price. My wife is an esthetician for almost 10 years and she loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Han

customer_reviews.title: and this one is by far the best. You can see much more detail with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought several types of these, and this one is by far the best. You can see much more detail with this one that the other cheap ones I boguht.
customer_reviews.author: seulater

customer_reviews.title: Headband Magnifier Glasses LED
customer_reviews.text: I really love my magnifier glasses they really serve my purposes. When I have to read fine print these are my go to. I highly recommend these glasses if you need help with fine print.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, a bit heavy for longer working hours, but it works excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Torres Rendon

customer_reviews.title: Working on a smart watch, did some fine soldering
customer_reviews.text: Got a splinter out with these. Working on a smart watch, did some fine soldering. There not perfect but well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL MCDUELL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are very handy for tatting and other things hard to see. Actually made visibility a lot better. Especially with the small light
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money with Interchangeable Lenses
customer_reviews.text: A must for working on detailed close up item. Much more convenient than using the usual magnifying glass!! Would be nice if they had a range of lenses to chose from that went up to +5 but is adequate for 95% of what the work I do.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY ON THE NOSE
customer_reviews.text: They do what I need but they are heavy on the nose bridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this. I use it to see small details on N Scale Model railroad items and also game figures, painting, and assembling. Feels sturdy and does fit over glasses. Light is bright and helpful. It is easy to move the angle of the magnifier and the light to see your work.
customer_reviews.author: DonK

customer_reviews.title: These might help a person who has exhausted the possibiliy of any further glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it can be worn like a pair of glasses or on the headband. Its lighted. I purchased this for Grandma who does a lot of hand work...knitting etc. and bingo.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well and is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well and is worth the money. On the downside, the battery compartment was designed by someone with a sadistic sense of humor.
customer_reviews.author: Delubious

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. Exactly what I needed for my crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Koerner

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use & the light is super bright.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them all the time. They have different strengths, you can easily change.The light is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: kathy cole

customer_reviews.title: Great for painting or doing models
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my paint by number for adults and my boyfriend uses them for his models. Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifiers.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. While the batteries are a little heavy, I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Delamar-Goss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. She does cross stitch. She loves it. Has more than enough light. Easily adjustable. Plus, it helps her see her work. It's comfortable to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that their are 5 different lenses at ...
customer_reviews.text: works well. I am looking forward to using these. I have used it once. I like the fact that their are 5 different lenses at different strenghs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Work very well so that I can see fine sewing. Well packaged. I like that there is a box that contains it all together with a custom holder for the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Worth every pennie
customer_reviews.text: This are perfect for making dainty jewelry and working with 2mm findings
customer_reviews.author: Marimar

customer_reviews.title: it is very useful
customer_reviews.text: it is very comfortable and easy to use. the glasses help a lot
customer_reviews.author: Saul Oswaldo Ordoñez Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I find this product quite helpful. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, however, because it can be a little difficult to get the phone in properly, especially if you have a phone case on your phone. Once you get it secured, though, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, hurts my nose
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy to use more than 30 min. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: SHELLEY

customer_reviews.title: Delivery problem
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with Headband Magnifier Glasses which i received in a few days. the second part of my order were magnifying glasses different type. which i expect to be delivered in about two month. Don't like
customer_reviews.author: David Vulikh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for money
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The lenses seem very well made, and much lighter than glass lenses. The whole thing is light enough that I haven't had to use the headband. The LED light is great too. Best $14 I've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive great gizmo indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Quality is well above average. Lenses are scratch free and easy to install or swap out. The LED lights can be adjusted easily. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nelyann Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see very small beads!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. kind of heavy on nose part but very clear and bright. Decided to use them with the eyeglass earwear rather than the elastic headband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool accessory!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes it much easier to see hand work. The light and magnifying capacity are excellent! A little heavy to wear for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: lindas555

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had these years ago. Very useful and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Brezinbyu

product_meta.title: Headband Magnifier Glasses LED Magnifying Loupe Head Mount Magnifier Hands—Free Bracket and Headband are Interchangeable 5 Replaceable Lenses1.0X,1.5X,2.0X,2.5X,3.5X (Upgraded Version)
feature_bullets: HIGH DEFINITION AND NO DISTORTION: The individual lenses /magnifying lenses can be easily assembled and dismantled.5 different sizes of head magnifier lenses can meet your different needs.

MORE COMFORTABLE TO WEAR: You can put this head mount magnifier on your head like a pair of glasses. Ergonomic frame design. Mirror leg can be removed and changed to elastic band. This headband magnifier glasses has a very light weigh so that you would not feel any burdened or uncomfortable.

HIGH QUALITY AND ADJUSTABLE LED LIGHT: The headband magnifiers has a lamp with 2 high quality LED. The movable head magnifier lens slot can adjust the distance between your eyes and lens for different needs to ensure accurate irradiation of light source on the surface of viewed object ,making it more convenient in use. This magnifying glass lamp can be used as a headlamp at night.
EASE EYE STRAIN: The acrylic optics lens of magnifying eyewear can help you see objects easily. Easing your eye strain while working long hours and free your hands.
VARIOUS USAGE: Perfect headset magnifier for close up work like dentists, electricians, jewelers, sewing, crafts, beauty, painting and the elderly.
